amendment.description: Amendment inserts a new title to support the expansion of the use of digital learning through competitive grants to partnerships to implement and evaluate the results of technology-based learning practices, strategies, tools, or programs at rural schools.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 40 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to support the expansion of the use of digital learning through competitive grants to partnerships to implement and evaluate the results of technology-based learning practices, strategies, tools, or programs at rural schools.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Loebsack amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 416).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Loebsack amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 416).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Loebsack.
